## Protocol.Emulation.SetVirtualTimePolicyRequest.budget property

If set, after this many virtual milliseconds have elapsed virtual time will be paused and a virtualTimeBudgetExpired event is sent.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
budget?: number;
```
